## Checklist
- [ ] Tests pass locally (`npm test` or `pytest`)
- [ ] No hardcoded API keys or secrets
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional format (feat:/fix:/test:/docs:)
- [ ] Posted PR link in team Discord channel
